text: @NYCMayor Children are a very low risk group, you didn't think much of your highest risk group, the elderly when genius @NYGovCuomo put COVID-19 pts in nursing homes. Where were ur objections? U two aren't on the same page n both ignorant.  🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️
